text:
Tableau |Seattle or Vancouver, Fulltime | UX Designer, Senior UX Designer, UX Manager |

Tableau's (http://tableau.com) design team is growing. We have openings for a UX designer in our Seattle offices and are looking to build up our our newly-opened Vancouver office with a UX manager and Senior UX Designer.

Full job descriptions and links for each right here:

Vancouver | Manager, User Experience Designer: http://rolp.co/nV75a Vancouver | Senior User Experience Designer: http://rolp.co/ExYL9 Seattle | User Experience Designer: http://rolp.co/NAhaa

I'm in the Seattle office myself. If you're interested in joining and would like to discuss more, feel free to get in touch at rwhitney@tableau.com as well.
